solution_line_template: If Karina is currently {karina_current_age}, and she is twice as old as her brother, then her brother is currently {karina_current_age}/{age_ratio} = <<{karina_current_age}/{age_ratio}={brother_current_age}>>{brother_current_age} years old.

If Karina was born in {karina_birth_year}, then her brother was born in {karina_birth_year}+{brother_current_age} = <<{karina_birth_year}+{brother_current_age}={brother_birth_year}>>{brother_birth_year}
